data.message: I like how people on here say that busta is better yet in the song calm down Eminem totally obliterates him in spitting.. And also Twista only has a couple songs to where you can even understand him and him and busta rap about the same stupid shit money and bitches and everyone on here should get their facts straight before hating. Em will woop both there asses in a freestyle and kills them in rap in general... As for tech n9ne he is equal with em both of them are rap gods no one could compare to either of them the way they rap is unreal so both of them would kill Twista and busta rhymes in anything and it is a proven fact

replies.message: Anybody who pretends they they couldn't understand what Twista was saying in is rhymes doesn't deserve to even speak on the subject... Twista is out of the game now, which is no big deal because the game is shit now. So Em can stand as "god" on pile shit if he wants... THIS WAS TEN YEARS AGO http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dpjnnIjvQgo  ...keep pretending you don't understand TWISTA but you understand that shit Em was doing in "rap god" u sound fuckin' silly... Twista is a beast...
